Package ThreeDimensionalShape

Class ThreeDimensionalShape

java.lang.Object
ThreeDimensionalShape.ThreeDimensionalShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ThreeDimensionalShape>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cone, Cylinder, OctagonalPrism, PentagonalPrism, Pyramid, SquarePrism, TriangularPrism
public abstract class ThreeDimensionalShape extends Object implements Comparable<ThreeDimensionalShape>
An abstract class representing a three-dimensional shape. It implements the Comparable interface to allow height-based comparisons between shapes. Subclasses must provide methods to implement calculating the shape's area and volume.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(ThreeDimensionalShape o)
      Compares the current shape's height to another shape's height.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<ThreeDimensionalShape>
      Parameters:
      o - The other shape to compare to.
      Returns:
      -1 if the current shape's height is greater than the other shape, 1 if it's smaller, or 0 if they are equal.
